entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
